text: Nabo kwa Thamudu twarabarungikiye mwene wabo Swalehe (iii) aca avuga ati:- mwebwe bantu banje! nimusenge Imana yanyu, mwebwe nta Mana mufise atari Imana yonyene gusa, niyo yabaremye ibakuye kw’Isi, nukubicarika kuriyo, rero nimuyisabe imbabazi hanyuma mugaruke kuriyo yonyene, mu vy’ukuri Umuremyi wanje ari hafi cane n’ukubakira
